name: christmas slopes: free range
description:
arrows/wasd- move, jump, fall

kind of a spiritual sequel to my old scratch game christmas slopes, by which i mean i made a completely unrelated skiing game and then remembered that i had already made one. this one is better i think! it's got less exploration but more momentum and better art- same music though haha

my jump distance pb is 60.8 btw :)

sounds are stock

music is snowball park by koji kondo
